This module implements utility functions.

Compile Options:

OptionDescriptionDefault
-d:pon2.assets=<str>Assets directory.../assets

  goalId*: cstring

  settingId*: cstring

    cstring("calc(16px + env(safe-area-inset-bottom))")),
                        (left, cstring("50%")),
                        (transform, cstring("translateX(-50%)")),
                        (zIndex, cstring("100"))])
counterStyle = style([(color, cstring(toHtmlRgba(CounterStyleColor))),
                      (fontSize, cstring("0.6rem")),
                      (position, cstring("absolute")),
                      (top, cstring("-0.2em")), (right, cstring("0.3em")),
                      (pointerEvents, cstring("none"))])
translucentStyle = style(backgroundColor,
